content: The power of the God cannot be overcome. Zanzar, this is the providence of the world. Even gods are merely being restricted to the limited power determined by poems that powered. Although great is not unlimited, that voice, how dare you disobey me? I am Monadda I was here at the beginning and I will proclaim again about that impossible drug it is time for you to choose does this world belong to Zanzar or does it belong to you? That is something I decided long ago We use our powers to fell a god and their deeds are destiny It's fainting the memory of a god's existence born from la chaos of creation
